title: Is there any software to make music sound better? - Quora

response.answer_text: Every major DAW comes stocked with all the tool to create great sounding music. Things like compressors and limiters, equalizers, reverbs and delays, and various other tools. Your task is to learn how to employ them properly to achieve the sound you want. This process takes years of research and experimentation to become proficient in. There is a vast network of resources at your disposal on our internet to help you in your discovery of audio production techniques. Unfortunatley the answer you want, I believe, is beyond the scope of a Quora inquiry.

There is a lot of software to improve the sound of music. Most studios now use Pro Tools to adjust and manipulate the music to improve it. Among the options are the famous / infamous auto-tune to make the vocals in key, quantise is used to make the time accurate, a de-esser to remove sibilance etc. It all depends on what type of music you are talking about
